verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came again to me,<WH559> saying,
Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> prophesy,<WH5012> and say,<WH559> Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3213> Wail,<WH3213> Alas for<WH1929> the day!<WH3117>
For the day<WH3117> is near,<WH7138> even the day<WH3117> of Yahweh<WH3068> is near;<WH7138> it shall be a day<WH3117> of clouds,<WH6051> a time<WH6256> of the nations.<WH1471>

A sword<WH2719> shall come<WH935> on Egypt,<WH4714> and anguish<WH2479> shall be in Ethiopia,<WH3568> when the slain<WH2491> shall fall<WH5307> in Egypt;<WH4714> and they shall take away<WH3947> her multitude,<WH1995> and her foundations<WH3247> shall be broken down.<WH2040>

Ethiopia,<WH3568> and Put,<WH6316> and Lud,<WH3865> and all the mixed<WH6153> people,<WH1121> and Cub,<WH1121> and the children of the land<WH776> that is allied<WH1285> with them,<WH5307> shall fall with them by the sword.<WH2719>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh:<WH3068> They also who uphold<WH5564> Egypt<WH4714> shall fall;<WH5307> and the pride<WH1347> of her power<WH5797> shall come down:<WH3381> from the tower<WH4024> of Seveneh<WH5482> shall they fall<WH5307> in it by the sword,<WH2719> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>

They shall be desolate<WH8074> in the midst<WH8432> of the countries<WH776> that are desolate;<WH8074> and her cities<WH5892> shall be in the midst<WH8432> of the cities<WH5892> that are wasted.<WH2717>
They shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh,<WH3068> when I have set<WH5414> a fire<WH784> in Egypt,<WH4714> and all her helpers<WH5826> are destroyed.<WH7665>

In that day<WH3117> shall messengers<WH4397> go forth<WH3318> from before me<WH6440> in ships<WH6716> to make the careless<WH983> Ethiopians<WH3568> afraid;<WH2729> and there shall be anguish<WH2479> on them,<WH3117> as in the day of Egypt;<WH4714> for,<WH935> behold, it comes.

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> I will also make the multitude<WH1995> of Egypt<WH4714> to cease,<WH7673> by the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon.<WH894>

He and his people<WH5971> with him,<WH6184> the terrible of the nations,<WH1471> shall be brought<WH935> in to destroy<WH7843> the land;<WH776> and they shall draw<WH7324> their swords<WH2719> against Egypt,<WH4714> and fill<WH4390> the land<WH776> with the slain.<WH2491>

I will make<WH5414> the rivers<WH2975> dry,<WH2724> and will sell<WH4376> the land<WH776> into the hand<WH3027> of evil<WH7451> men;<WH776> and I will make the land desolate,<WH8074> and all that is therein,<WH4393> by the hand<WH3027> of strangers:<WH2114> I,<WH3068> Yahweh, have spoken it.<WH1696>

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH136> I will also destroy<WH6> the idols,<WH1544> and I will cause the images<WH457> to cease<WH7673> from Memphis;<WH5297> and there shall be no more a prince<WH5387> from the land<WH776> of Egypt:<WH4714> and I will put<WH5414> a fear<WH3374> in the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
I will make Pathros<WH6624> desolate,<WH8074> and will set<WH5414> a fire<WH784> in Zoan,<WH6814> and will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> on No.<WH4996>
I will pour<WH8210> my wrath<WH2534> on Sin,<WH5512> the stronghold<WH4581> of Egypt;<WH4714> and I will cut off<WH3772> the multitude<WH1995> of No.<WH4996>

I will set<WH5414> a fire<WH784> in Egypt:<WH4714> Sin<WH5512> shall be in great<WH2342> anguish,<WH2342> and No<WH4996> shall be broken<WH1234> up;<WH5297> and Memphis shall have adversaries<WH6862> in the daytime.<WH3119>
The young men<WH970> of Aven<WH206> and of Pibeseth<WH6364> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword;<WH2719> and these cities shall go<WH3212> into captivity.<WH7628>

At Tehaphnehes<WH8471> also the day<WH3117> shall withdraw<WH2821> itself,<WH7665> when I shall break there the yokes<WH4133> of Egypt,<WH4714> and the pride<WH1347> of her power<WH5797> shall cease<WH7673> in her:<WH1931> as for her,<WH6051> a cloud shall cover<WH3680> her,<WH1323> and her daughters shall go<WH3212> into captivity.<WH7628>
Thus will I execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> on Egypt;<WH4714> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh.<WH3068>
It happened in the eleventh<WH259> year,<WH8141> in the first<WH7223> month,<WH7651> in the seventh day of the month,<WH2320> that the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> I have broken<WH7665> the arm<WH2220> of Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt;<WH4714> and behold,<WH2280> it has not been bound up, to apply healing<WH7499> medicines,<WH7760> to put a bandage<WH2848> to bind<WH2280> it,<WH2388> that it be strong to hold<WH8610> the sword.<WH2719>

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> Behold,<WH6547> I am against Pharaoh king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> and will break<WH7665> his arms,<WH2220> the strong<WH2389> arm,<WH7665> and that which was broken; and I will cause the sword<WH2719> to fall<WH5307> out of his hand.<WH3027>
I will scatter<WH6327> the Egyptians<WH4714> among the nations,<WH1471> and will disperse<WH2219> them through the countries.<WH776>

I will strengthen<WH2388> the arms<WH2220> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> and put<WH5414> my sword<WH2719> in his hand:<WH3027> but I will break<WH7665> the arms<WH2220> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> and he shall groan<WH5008> before<WH6440> him with the groanings<WH5009> of a deadly wounded man.<WH2491>

I will hold<WH2388> up the arms<WH2220> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon;<WH894> and the arms<WH2220> of Pharaoh<WH6547> shall fall down;<WH5307> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh,<WH3068> when I shall put<WH5414> my sword<WH2719> into the hand<WH3027> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> and he shall stretch it out<WH5186> on the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
I will scatter<WH6327> the Egyptians<WH4714> among the nations,<WH1471> and disperse<WH2219> them through the countries;<WH776> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh.<WH3068>
